title: set-fqdn input
description: Input schema of the set-fqdn action

node.description: The identifier of the cluster node.

reachability_check.description: Check if the new FQDN can be correctly resolved and is reachable by HTTP from other cluster nodes.

hostname.description: The hostname part of the FQDN for the node.

domain.description: The domain part of the FQDN for the node.
